TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pick extends System.Activities.NativeActivity
Public NotInheritable Class Pick Inherits NativeActivity
public ref class Pick sealed : System::Activities::NativeActivity

summary.span: 이벤트 기반 제어 흐름 모델링을 제공합니다.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 작업은 이벤트에 대한 응답으로 여러 작업 중 하나만 실행한다는 점에서 와 유사하게 동작합니다.This activity behaves similarly to in that it executes only one of several activities in response to events. 실행하도록 선택된 동작은 이벤트 집합에서 선택한 이벤트에 의해 정의됩니다.The action chosen to be executed is defined by an event, chosen from a set of events. ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동을 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 이 예제에서는 [Pick 활동을 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_Pick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_pick/cs/program.cs#1)]

summary.span: 들어오는 이벤트를 기준으로 활동이 잠재적으로 하나를 실행하는 개체의 컬렉션입니다.

span.span: The collection of objects that the activity potentially executes one of, based on incoming events.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동의 Branches 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates setting the Branches property of a activity. 이 예제에서는 [Pick 활동을 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) sample.
